Episode.summary: Dre has always felt his older son was never like him, but when he finally meets Juniorâ€™s cool friends, Dre is all in and happy that his son may have the opportunity for an actual social life. Meanwhile, Bow is dealing with Ruby, Zoey, Jack and Diane not confessing to things breaking around the house and decides to handle it her own way after some judgment from Vivian.
Episode.title: Super Rich Kids
